Html.name: Html0
Html.content: The inheritance group editor's "Show removed"/"Hide removed" button will toggle the display of elements which have been hidden from the inheritance group in an ancestor folder in the inheritance group editor. To show a hidden element in the current page, first click on the "Show removed" button that displays the hidden elements. They are displayed with diagonal stripes on top to distinguish them from the other elements. Now hover the Edit point of the element you want to show and click the "Add content" button from the appearing menu.
